title: 50 Seriously Sensational Soundtrack Songs!
description:
Here is a small sampling of some of my favorite songs/music from various movies, shows and soundtracks. Some tracks are from dedicated film scores, others are just individual songs that were used in the production. There's no rhyme or reason to the order, style or genre of music. All songs are in MP3 format, and are in 320kps. Oh, and ALL are awesome!!

I probably could have easily come up with a list of 500 songs, but here are 50 of my faves.

I hope you enjoy and please remember to seed for as long as you can!!

01. Jockey Full of Bourbon - by: Tom Waits (Down By Law) 1986
02. Girls - by: Death in Vegas (Lost In Translation) 2003
03. Creep - by: Karen Souza (The Zero Theorem) 2014
04. Spikey Cars - by: Tom Holkenborg (Mad Max Fury Road) 2015
05. Come and Get Your Love - by: Redbone (Guardians of the Galaxy) 2014
06. Like a Dog Chasing Cars - by: Hans Zimmer (The Dark Knight) 2008
07. We're Going Home - by: Clint Mansell (Moon) 2009
08. 20th Century Boy - by: T. Rex (Lords of Dogtown) 2005
09. Me And The Devil - by: Gil Scott-Heron (True Blood Season 3) 2011
10. Master Exploder - by: Tenacious D (Tenacious D: The Pick of Destiny) 2006
11. A.M. 180 - by: Grandaddy (28 Days Later) 2002
12. People Who Died - by: Jim Carroll Band (The Basketball Diaries) 1995
13. The Red Telephone - by: Love (Taking Woodstock) 2009
14. Unsquare Dance - by: The Dave Brubeck Quartet (Silver Linings Playbook) 2012
15. The Ecstacy of Gold - by: Ennio Morricone (The Good, The Bad and the Ugly) 1966
16. Hayling - by: FC Kahuna (Layer Cake) 2005
17. Little Green Bag - by: George Baker Selection (Reservoir Dogs) 1992
18. Nightcall - by: Kavinsky & Lovefoxxx (Drive) 2011
19. Deutscher Girls - by: Adam and The Ants (Jubilee) 1978
20. Two Hearts - by: Chris Isaak (True Romance) 1995
21. Hells Bells - by: Cary Ann Hearst (True Blood Season 3) 2011
22. Reel Ten - by: The Plugz (Repo Man) 1984
23. Mini-Guns - by: Paul Leonard Morgan (Dredd) 2012
24. The Warriors Theme - by: Barry De Vorzon (The Warriors) 1979
25. Dream Is Collapsing - by: Hans Zimmer (Inception) 2010
26. Such A Fool - by: 22-20s (RockNrolla) 2008
27. Hallelujah - by: John Cale (Basquiat) 1996
28. Until the End of the World - by: U2 (Until The End Of The World) 1991
29. Playground Love - by: Air (The Virgin Suicides) 2000
30. Think - by: Kalieda (John Wick) 2014
31. Where Is My Mind - by: The Pixies (Fight Club) 1999
32. The Pink Room - by: David Lynch (Twin Peaks Fire Walk With Me) 1992
33. Death Is The Road To Awe - by: Clint Mansell (The Fountain) 2006
34. Breathe Me - by: Sia (Six Feet Under Vol.2) 2005
35. The Hot Gates - by: Tyler Bates (300) 2007
36. Down to the River to Pray - by: Alison Krauss (O Brother, Where Art Thou?) 2000
37. Love Is Blindness - by: Jack White (The Great Gatsby) 2013
38. Rinzler - by: Daft Punk (Tron Legacy) 2010
39. I Am the Unknown - by: Aliens (21) 2008
40. One of These Things First - by: Nick Drake (Garden State) 2004
41. Django - by: Luis Bacalov & Rocky Roberts (Django Unchained) 2012
42. Black Tears - by: Tyler Bates (Guardians of the Galaxy) 2014
43. Whiplash - by: Justin Hurwitz & Tim Simonec (Whiplash) 2014
44. It's All over Now, Baby Blue - by: Van Morrison (Basquiat) 1996
45. Hole Drop - by: Mike Shinoda & Joseph Trapanese (The Raid: Redemption) 2012
46. Trouble - by: Elliot Smith (Thumbsucker) 2005
47. Across 110th Street - by: Bobby Womack (Jackie Brown) 1997
48. The Surface Of The Sun - by: John Murphy (Sunshine) 2007
49. Blade Runner (End Titles) - by: Vangelis (Blade Runner) 1982
50. End of Line - by: Daft Punk (Tron Legacy) 2010

Enjoy!

-stirgy
